dc:title: Notes From Florida
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Depicts the gaiety of Black Christian worship and the lack of Catholicism in the south. Also relates the grief of a black woman at the death of her daughter and her daughters funeral.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 36 1932-06-22 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
